ygData.subject: Re: A Few Questions for Fellow Bards....
ygData.msgSnippet: i am wondering how you got the lute, it comes off the named gypsy in mistmoore, and i died getting it at level 40.  i could not discern any special effects
ygData.messageBody:
i am wondering how you got the lute, it comes off the named gypsy in
mistmoore, and i died getting it at level 40. i could not discern any
special effects either, so i am just holding on to it. i heard she also
drops battle drums, which are supposed to be better than our normal hand
drum, though i do not have one to test. but i would certainly not sell it.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 45 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tim and Mary Steed [mailto:timandmary@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, June 15, 1999 11:54 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] A Few Questions for Fellow Bards....
>
>
> From: "Tim and Mary Steed" <timandmary@...>
>
> Hello there all! I have a few questions that arose during my adventure
> today....
>
> 1) I have a Lute called "Lute of the Gypsy Princess" or
> something like that.
> Does anyone know if it has any significance? Is it just a
> quest item? I
> tried using it, and it works in all respects (that I could
> tell) like a
> normal Lute. Nothing special. I did notice that I could sell
> it for almost 4
> plat, where a normal lute doesn't make it to 1 plat. Any ideas?
>
> 2) I also just picked up "Lisera", a lute that a bard in Qeynos needs
> tuning. He says that I need to take it to someone named
> Nostrolo in the
> "Karanas". But, I looked and looked and could not FINFD This Nostrolo
> person. Is this a broken quest, or have I just missed this
> fella? Could
> someone give me an idea where to look for Nostrolo? Also, is
> Lisera a lute
> you should KEEP, meaning is IT better than a regular Lute?
>
> 3) Does anyone know of a site that has descriptions of what
> songs do above
> 24th level??
>
> Thanks for all your help!!
>
> Tim
> Tallonn Stringfellow - Bertox
>
>
